titleStmt.title: And being above -- xxiijc. weight upon every hundred ijd. ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: A fragment. Corporate authorship conjectured from text.
Title from opening words of text. Imprint from colophon.
Item is bound with items from 1647.
Sets fees for cartage within the City and liberties of London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
